issue.title: MAP colors customization not availlable in order and request views
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

V2 feature "MAP colors customization" is now supported (#942).
But we didn't add it to the "order" and "request" view.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

+ grid download map !
